Uses of Package
backend

  • Packages that use backend 
    Package Description
    backend
    Provides necessary classes to create a functioning backend for a space explorers game
    backendGUIExtensions
    Provides necessary classes to extend backend for use with a GUI
    backendTesting
    Provides JUnit test cases for backend
    commandLine
    Provides the game environment for running a space explorers game through a CLI
    graphicalInterface
    Provides a GUI implementation of a space explorers game
  • Classes in backend used by backend 
    Class Description
    Consumable
    Stores information regarding a consumable item in game.
    CrewClass
    Potential classes for crew members
    CrewMember
    Stores information regarding a single crew member including their name, class, current health, hunger, tiredness and action points, and whether or not they have the space plague.
    Planet
    Stores information regarding a single planet including its name, description, whether or not it has a part, has been searched, and has had its part found.
    PlanetFindableObjects
    Potential items found on a planet
    PlanetSearchOutput
    Contains information regarding the item found when searching a planet Used by CrewMember when searchPlanet() is called
    PossibleEndings
    Potential endings that the player might reach
    RandomEventOutput
    Contains a random event that occurred and the crew member involved Should only be used by the RandomEvent class
    RandomEventTypes
    Contains the possible random events that may occur on a day transition
  • Classes in backend used by backendGUIExtensions 
    Class Description
    Consumable
    Stores information regarding a consumable item in game.
    CrewClass
    Potential classes for crew members
    CrewMember
    Stores information regarding a single crew member including their name, class, current health, hunger, tiredness and action points, and whether or not they have the space plague.
    Planet
    Stores information regarding a single planet including its name, description, whether or not it has a part, has been searched, and has had its part found.
  • Classes in backend used by backendTesting 
    Class Description
    Consumable
    Stores information regarding a consumable item in game.
    CrewMember
    Stores information regarding a single crew member including their name, class, current health, hunger, tiredness and action points, and whether or not they have the space plague.
    CureItem
    Allows the creation of cure items for removing the space plague from Crew Members.
    Planet
    Stores information regarding a single planet including its name, description, whether or not it has a part, has been searched, and has had its part found.
  • Classes in backend used by commandLine

    CrewMember
    Stores information regarding a single crew member including their name, class, current health, hunger, tiredness and action points, and whether or not they have the space plague.

  • Classes in backend used by graphicalInterface 
    Class Description

    Stores information regarding a consumable item in game.
